\subsection*{Aufgabe 8}

\begin{verbatim}
dbtype sumx.m;

%generate random vector
size = 10;
a = rand(2^size, 1);

%calculate sum
y = sumx(a, size);
z = sum(a);

%display result
disp(y);
disp(z);
\end{verbatim}

        \color{lightgray} \begin{verbatim}
1     function y=sumx(x,L)
2     
3     if (L > 0)
4     	%% left intervall 1 - 2^L/2
5     	left = x(1:(2^L)/2);
6     	%% right intervall  2^L/2 + 1 - 2^L
7     	right = x((2^L)/2+1:2^L);
8     	y = sumx(left, L-1) + sumx(right, L-1);
9     else
10    	y = x(1);
11    end
12    
13    end
  527.4870

  527.4870

\end{verbatim} \color{black}
